abouts.title: About Us
abouts.description1: We are keen to meet the needs of investors and facilitate the search for real estate in the Emirates
abouts.description2: Therefore, we studied the market and focused on finding solutions that meet the desires of real estate seekers and real estate agents
abouts.description3: Now you can enjoy choosing between many different residential units and enjoy complete luxury near all services in the Emirates
abouts.description4: We provide you with the best real estate services in the UAE.
abouts.description5: We strive to address and meet the demands of both residents and investors in the most efficient and effective manner possible.
abouts.description6: We assist you in selecting the most appropriate and finest option for your housing and investment needs, with great dependability and accuracy
abouts.description7: Invest now in Dubai and other Emirates' most beautiful and crucial residential districts with the highest investment return.

footer.title: New Golden Future
footer.real_estate_gate: We always seek to give our customers with great service as well as complete transparency and support. Enjoy luxury and security in the most attractive places in the  UAE that are ideal for residential and investment purposes.

details_building.title: Apartment With private pool
details_building.description3: Immerse yourself in an enchanting fusion of Italian elegance and Dubai refinement for a unique and extraordinary experience
details_building.description4: This architectural gem rises majestically, offering beautifully designed apartments and studios, all with private pools on the balconies. An exceptional residence awaits you
details_building.description5: From contemporary architecture to futuristic interiors, SAMANA Portofino embodies luxury at its finest. Its proximity to iconic sites and popular destinations offers a cosmopolitan lifestyle while preserving an oasis of tranquility within its gated community
details_building.description6: Private pool on balcony overlooking Dubai
details_building.description7: Relax in an exclusive experience with your own private pool offering panoramic views over Dubai. SAMANA Portofino apartments are meticulously designed with expansive terraces that offer unobstructed views, creating the ideal setting for living in the Middle most glamorous city.  miss this unique and exclusive opportunity to live at SAMANA Portofino
details_building.description8: Playground, Mini Golf, Virtual Golf, Swimming pool, Cinema, Podcast Studio, Gym,...
details_building.description9: Discover magnificent views and exceptional facilities.Discover much more than spectacular views of Dubai at our apartments. Enjoy a range of first-rate facilities, including an open-air cinema, swimming pool, gym, playground, barbecue area, all nestled in a verdant setting.

buildings.real_estate_gate: Everything you want you will find here.
